document.full_text: the pentagon's next challenge in the $382 billion lockheed martin corp f-35 fighter program will be cutting longer-term operating and maintenance costs and keeping unit production costs low.
document.title: long-term costs next challenge for f-35 jet program
lines_and_colors: the pentagon's next challenge in the $382 billion lockheed martin corp f-35 fighter program will be cutting longer-term operating and maintenance costs and keeping unit production costs low.
